title: AU Small Finance Bank shares tank 9%; Brokerages bullish, stock may rally 20%, should you buy, hold or sell? - The Financial Express
content: AU Small Finance Bank shares tank 9%; Brokerages bullish, stock may rally 20%, should you buy, hold or sell?  The Financial Express
description: With an improvement in economic activity, AU Small Finance Bank appears on track to deliver superior growth while retail deposit mix continues to improve supporting the margin profile. The stock touched intraday low of 1,075, down 9.8 per cent on the Bombay Stock Exchange.
